评论概述: Super cute, but GO UP in size 100%
评论详情: So luckily I read previously written reviews for this about going up in size. So glad I listened; I normally wear a Large and ordered and XL, and was still on the last clip on the back when wearing this. Honestly probably could of gone to a 2xl just for more comfortability and adjustments. But none the less it was super cute and I got so many compliments when I wore it to a concert. 38C in bra size, if yall are curious, also took a picture of the back of it because no one shows that. Spikes are also a two hole deal so they do rotate and need to be adjusted to set correctly.

Material seems to be good. I like that it has the plastic/rubber grip on the inside so it stays in place. I first ordered a Small, which fit, I returned it because I thought it made me look a little cubby. ( 5'4 138lbs) Got a Medium and love it. Only thing is I'm not a busty gal so my boo and bees didn't fill up the cup. With most tops I usually have problems with the cups looking flattened or being able to see down my shirt when bent over. Didn't have that problem with this! The girls were good all night!

I got a small and I’m a perfect small. I thought it was going to be too small but I squeezed in. Maybe a medium would’ve got on better. But either way this top was in great condition and held up at the Beyoncé concert!!
2 hours into an 8 hour event and studs fell off. They are sown on with 1 long thread so...once one falls off, they all start falling off. Do not waste money even if you plan to wear once.
It looked beautiful and I loved. Returned it because it was too big on me.

评论概述: Spikes fell off as I pulled it out of plastic packaging, also slightly big
评论详情: Overall Fit: I read the reviews and decided to order a size up. I typically wear XS/2 or occasionally S, chest size 32C/34B, 100 lbs, and based on the reviews, I ordered a Medium.  It's not too big, but I have the hooks on the tightest setting, and it still feels like it would fall off if I danced and moved around alot.  There is non-slip silicon strip on the back side, but not on the front chest line, so I would have to wear the straps.Quality:  3 spikes fell off as I pulled it out of plastic packaging, but I caught it before more spikes came off.  I noticed that the stitching was loose, but it can be fixed.  ANNOYING, though. Debating whether I should just knot the string to prevent further falling  off, since it's not very noticeable b/c there are so many spikes.  The gold spikes are too yellow in my opinion.  Overall it feels comfortable despite the look of it
